description: This file is a configuration script for the Vite build tool in a SvelteKit project. It sets up the development server settings, plugin integrations, and testing configurations for both client and server environments.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and exports the Vite configuration object with specified plugins, server, and test settings.

methods.name: svelteTesting
methods.description: A plugin function from the testing-library for Svelte, used to extend the testing configuration.
